title: Quick FPS question. (Patch 7.10 - 7.14)

replies.body:
Same happening to me prior to this like 7.13 n before no problems until this update im getting low frames when from 50-60 to 8-40 fps

I done driver updates and deleted and re download league it doesn't help? Any ideas?

> [{quoted}](name=Reaper Of Chao14,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1LgHG130,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-13T21:05:17.630+0000)
>
> Same happening to me prior to this like 7.13 n before no problems until this update im getting low frames when from 50-60 to 8-40 fps
> 
> I done driver updates and deleted and re download league it doesn't help? Any ideas?

ive factory reset my computer, even upgraded to windows 10, and redownloaded game. I play on the lowest settings too and all my drivers are up to date. Still getting low fps from 15-50.

Could just be general wear and tear that could use a refresher.  Outdated drivers or even bad game files could be causing this, but our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help rule out some possibilities while tuning up your PC.  Let me know if it helps!

Not to be rude, but I think it is pretty clear that this is not just a coincidence. I, too, have random FPS lag now after the latest patch. My ping is constantly below 60 ms but after the patch 7.14 there are FPS issues. Most of it is based around animations. I have updated my drivers and repaired my game files. This lag never used to happen but now it is occurring. You can see several other people have posted about this new issue arising from the latest patch, can you please address this sincerely?

I actually do have the same problem after patch 7.14

League client suddenly used a lot more cpu and memory in game which cause lag and stuff like that. 

In game video setting is always the lowest, it just started to happen after 7.14 update
